title: FlowResult

isInput.description: Indicates whether the flow is an input or not.

isReferenceFlow.description: `true` if this is the quantitative reference flow of the result.

flowProperty.description: The flow property in which the amount of the result is given. If missing, the amount is expected to be given in the reference flow property of the flow.

unit.description: The unit in which the amount of the result is given. If missing, the amount is expected to be given in the reference unit of the flow.

location.description: The location of this flow result in case of a regionalized result.

description: A calculation result of a flow.
